data.text: The COVID-19 pandemic impact was still clearly visible in the June traffic figures but the number of passengers more than doubled from May and cargo-only demand remained strong. Read more on our traffic performance in June: https://t.co/iJe5qLxUrS https://t.co/egqIXbNEQ1

data.text: @Srinivaaa1 Hi! We are operating to Stockholm Arlanda everyday. // Helmi

@kiki_salo Hei, matkustajalla tulisi olla oma maski (tai useampi pidemmälle lennolle) mukana, koska niitä ei ole kentällä / koneissa jokaiselle matkustajalle saatavilla. Maskia tulee pitää päällä koko lennon, paitsi syödessä ja juodessa. /Elli
@HViikinniemi Hi Harri, and apologies about the delay with our answer. Kindly dm us information about your reservation so we can take a look at situation of your refund request./Hanna-Mari
@chem_25 Hi Mikhail, I am truly sorry for that. The situation has evolved and we have tried our best to keep our customers informed. /Krista from Finnair

Update on our refund processing: We have received over 300 000 refund applications, of which 160 000 are already handled. We have returned over 247 million euros to our customers. Our team is working hard to get all the refunds processed. Thank you for your patience! https://t.co/5xJIpuOyWz
RT @TopiManner: Last week we at ⁦@Finnair⁩ started the gradual ramp-up of operations, welcoming notably more passengers than during previou…

Finnair pilots are getting ready to get back up in the sky through training and flight simulator training. ✈️Read more about the training process: https://t.co/WfpmMYUPAc #aviation https://t.co/Nw46FjUDAd
@AirForceTuan Hi, sorry to hear that. Please send us a DM with your booking and contact details, so that we can have a look at your refund application. //Mari

Preliminary results of Finnair’s rights offering have now been published. “My warmest thanks to all Finnair’s old and new shareholders who participated in the rights offering”, says Finnair’s CEO Topi Manner. https://t.co/MnttUYNfSY https://t.co/mjecmm0Hsw
@susantlandry Hi Susan! We could take another look at your refund request. Could you DM your booking reference as travelling route and dates? // Helmi

@saintzoya Hi! Unfortunately because of this coronavirus situation all our channels are quite congested at the moment. If we can do something for you in here, please send your booking reference and contact details which are added to there via DM. // Helmi

@riittanissinen2 Hei Riitta, ja pahoitteluni viiveestä takaisinmaksusi käsittelyssä. Mikäli haluat että tarkistamme hakemuksesi tilanteen, lähetäthän meille tarkemmat tiedot yksityisviestillä//Hanna-Mari

data.text: @RitaTainola Hi Rita, Good to hear, we hope to see you soon on board with us. /Jaana

@mantakoo Hi! Sorry to hear about this. I recommend that you clear your browsing history and then try again. If you still have problems with the booking, our customer service will help you. Please contact us by calling or chatting through our webistes. https://t.co/oC3lkjl5HX

-Helmi

@mynamesjed Hi, my apologies for long queue. Due coronavirus situation all our channels are very congested at the moment. Of we can help you through here, kindly send your booking reference and contact details via DM. Please notice that in this channel we answer with delay. // Helmi
RT @HelsinkiAirport: Finavia commits to follow the safety recommendations issued by EASA at Helsinki Airport and carries out its own active…

@kaunisuni Hi! Sorry for late reply, in this channel we answer with delay so in urgent matters it's advisable to contact us by calling or trough live chat. But if there's still something we can do for you, please send your booking reference and contact details via DM. // Helmi

RT @followdpts: Finnair relaunch flight to Geneva - the airline operated its last flight on March 21st
Welcome back ⁦@Finnair⁩ 🇫🇮🇨🇭 https:/…
@kiki_salo Hei Kirsti! Kyllä, Finnairin lennoilla on edelleen käytettävä maskeja. // Helmi

@basmuvic I'm sorry, our customer service can be quite congested these days. Please DM us your booking reference, travel dates, names of the passengers and e-mail address on the booking so we can have a look at your request :) /Elli

@kallespopkonst Unfortunately the handling times at our refunds department are quite long now. If you want us to checkk your request, please DM us your booking reference, travel dates, names of the passengers and e-mail address on the booking and we'll have  a look. /Elli
@MikaMyllynen Hei Mika, juttua on nyt päivitetty meidän vastauksella. /Krista Finnairilta

@robban_rob Hei Robban! Pahoittelut että takaisinmaksu on viivästynyt. Voisin kuitenkin tarkistaa että hakemuksessa on kaikki kunnossa, laitathan yksityisviesitillä varausutunnuksen, lentoreitin sekä matkustuspäivät. // Helmi

@susantlandry Hi Susan, because of the COVID-19 we had to cancel hundreds of flights and thousands of passengers were unfortunately affected by the cancellations. That caused a massive amount of refund requests. Thank you for your patience and understanding. /Keijo

@jakehallam01 Hi Jake! Unfortunately we have queues with processing the refund requests due high volume of corona related requests. If you wish us to take a look at situation of your refund request kindly send us details with a direct message.//Hanna-Mari

data.text: We clean our aircraft at every “turn” when the aircraft are on the ground. Places that people touch a lot – like buckles, armrests and tables – get an intensified cleaning. We also provide you wipes in onboard, so you can wipe any surfaces if you wish. https://t.co/mX8rJW0ED0 https://t.co/BIb8C9D2J2
@southwestward Hi, I just answered to your DM, apologies for the late reply. /Keijo
@jakehallam01 Hello! Unfortunately we currently have delays in the refund processing due to a high volume of coronavirus related refund applications. The response time is now about 13 weeks.
@miiru0922 Hi, If you would like us to look at your reservation and help you with it, please send your reservation details via DM. /Jaana
@flisholland Hi, I just answered your DM. /Jaana
@jorgenwes Skicka oss direktmeddelande (bokningsreferens och för identifieringsändamål e-postadress) så att vi kan kontrollera din begäran om återbetalning. -Hanna

@jorgenwes Hej! Tyvärr har vi för närvarande förseningar i återbetalningsbehandlingen på grund av en stor volym av koronavirusrelaterade återbetalningsapplikationer. Svarstiden är nu cirka 13 veckor.  -Hanna
@jstjern Hei, takaisinmaksumme ovat valitettavasti ruuhkaantuneet koronavirustilanteen ja peruutusten myötä. Käsittelyaika tällä hetkellä on noin 13 viikkoa. Pahoittelut tilanteesta. -Hanna

@irfan_ahmed611 Unfortunately our refunds handling queue is quite congested at the moment. Please DM us your booking reference, e-mail address, names on the booking and travel dates so we can check everything is alright with your refund request. /Elli
@southwestward Hi, sorry to hear that. Please send us a DM with your booking and contact details, so that we can have a look at your refund application. //Mari
@PerochoPevs Hi, if this is concerning the reservation which is made via a travel agency, then please contact them regarding your refund. We are not able to handle this from here. //Mari
Follow us on Instagram for the next couple of days to get a pilots view on how we are ramping up our operations. https://t.co/QHUE00E11h

@espeybee Hi Sam! You can fill in the refund request on our website: https://t.co/oFFK2IPFcB or if you wish us to take a look at this you can send us a direct message with your booking reference and contact information. If you have booked through an travel agency kindly contact them/Hanna

data.text: @jargal0512 Hi! Please notice I answered to your DM. //Anu

@PaulRaeburn Hi Paul! Unfortunately almost all services at Helsinki airport are closed, also Finnair lounges. There is play area for kids near gate 20, I hope that is something your son would like. /Sari
@MissHops93 Hi, I have sent you a DM. //Mari
@RichardGerrar17 Hi, thank you for the proposition and have a nice day! 😊 //Mari

Planning your trips? Before you travel, check the authorities’ travel recommendations in your destination country. Some countries for example require temperature screening upon arrival and wearing masks in public areas. More information: https://t.co/QNRR0tU2ML https://t.co/NgrcSGHMu3
@TommiJamsa Hei, tällä hetkellä lennot lennetään täydellä kapasiteetilla. Voit toki lukea varotoimenpiteistä linkin kautta: https://t.co/ztdwlKTb1b //Mari

@jimnche Hi, I tried to send you a DM, but was not able to. For safety reasons, please delete this public tweet with your booking and contact details and send us a DM, so that we can get back to you with more information. //Mari
Happy Midsummer! This weekend Finns celebrate summer by the bonfires and enjoy the midnight sun. Hyvää juhannusta! https://t.co/DfTpV5XHhZ

data.text: @ddaniilp Hello, kindly DM us your booking reference, name like it's on the ticket and flight details, we will check the booking. //Katja
@ExpatMamasita Hi, I recommend that you contact the ministry of foreign affairs/border control, in order to get more information regarding the possible travel restrictions. //Mari
@JonttuJonne Hi! Thanks for your suggestion! Hopefully we can make it happen. Have a great summer! /Sari

@PowerStateFail Hi Paul! Unfortunately all our flights to/from Dublin are cancelled in July. If you have reservation you want us to take a look, please send your booking reference and contact details via DM. // Helmi

@maireus Hei, mikäli voimme auttaa sinua varaukseesi liittyen, pyytäisin laittamaan meille yksityisviestillä varaustunnuksen, nimesi kuten se on lipulla, sekä lentotiedot, niin pääsemme tarkistamaan tilannetta. //Katja
@jimnche Hi Charlotte! Sorry to hear about your cancelled flight, please send your booking reference and contact details via DM so we can check this. // Helmi

@needmoreFX Hei, meillä on ikävä kyllä viivettä takaisinmaksujen käsittelyissä tällä hetkellä. Lähettäisitkö meille varaustunnuksen ja yhteystietosi yksityisviestinä, niin voimme tarkistaa takaisinmaksuhakemuksesi tilanteen. //Mari

@sefiirike Hi, we had to cancel some of our flights to Brussels as the bankruptcy of Swissport Belgium affected ground handling services at the airport. Now we can resume to our normal flight schedule. /Mari

@Whatscookingin Hi, kindly DM us your name like it's on the ticket as well as email address and phone number from the bookings, we will take a look. //Katja

@Matt_Breitinger Hi Matthias! If your flights aren't cancelled it's possible to postpone travel to the next spring. If you want us to check your reservation, please send booking reference and contact details from the booking via DM. // Helmi

@Trayset Hi! Please send us your booking reference, flight route and email address from the booking as DM so we can check if there is something we can do to help you. /Sari
@DERosson Hi! Unfortunately I'm not able to open that link. If you have some questions regarding your booking, please send booking reference and contact details via DM. // Helmi
@ankitsays_ Hi Ankit, I sent you DM. // Helmi

@wikkie777 Hi! I just answered to your DM. /Minna

@ChriDeParis75 Hi, you should contact the ministry of foreign affairs or border control to check what is required at the moment due to the travel restrictions. There is no new information regarding the meals at the moment. //Mari

Going on a flight and wondering how to travel safe during the coronavirus pandemic? Check in online and pack light to avoid queues at the airport, take face masks with you and check the authorities’ travel recommendations in your destination. More tips: https://t.co/QNRR0tU2ML https://t.co/JpZlm3ci85

data.text: @Omar_Alogaidi Hi, for more information regarding any possible travel restrictions you should contact the ministry of foreign affairs. //Mari
@petrisarvamaa Hei! Pahoittelut lentosi peruuntumisesta ja aiheutuneesta harmista. Jos haluat tehdä korvaushakemuksen tapahtuneesta, se onnistuu osoitteessa https://t.co/BUCdFllQp3. -Sara

urls.title: Palautteet ja korvaukset
urls.description: Meillä on tällä hetkellä ruuhkaa. Pahoittelemme pitkää vastausaikaa. Keskimääräinen käsittelyaikamme on neljä viikkoa. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestäsi. Otamme mielellämme vastaan palautetta ja autamme sinua korvaushakemuksissa ja muissa ongelmatilanteissa. Palautteesi on meille arvokasta ja se auttaa meitä palvelumme kehittämisessä. Yleisemmissä aiheissa pyydämme tutustumaan usein kysyttyihin kysymyksiimme tai kysymään apua chat-palvelumme

data.text: The UK has introduced new requirements for customers arriving in the country as of 8 June. You must provide information about your journey and your contact details before your trip and self-isolate for 14 days when you arrive in the UK. Read more: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X
